blocks.content: Define the internal direct product of a family of subgroups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-dprd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cdprd, cmpo(s0, s1, cgrp, cab(s2, wa(wf(cv(s2), cdm(cv(s2)), cfv(csubg, cv(s0))), wral(s3, cdm(cv(s2)), wa(wral(s4, cdif(cdm(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s3))), wss(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))))), wceq(cin(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, cv(s0))), cuni(cima(cv(s2), cdif(cdm(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s3))))))), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))))))), crn(cmpt(s5, crab(s2, cixp(s3, cdm(cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), co(cv(s0), cgsu, cv(s5))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-dprd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ DProd =(s0 ∈ Grp, s1 ∈ { s2 |((s2 : dom(s2)→(SubGrp ` s0))∧ ∀(s3 ∈ dom(s2),(∀(s4 ∈(dom(s2)\ { s3 }),(s2 ` s3)⊆((Cntz ` s0)`(s2 ` s4)))∧((s2 ` s3)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` s0))` ⋃(s2 "(dom(s2)\ { s3 }))))= {(0 ` s0)})))} ↦ ran((s5 ∈ { s2 ∈ ×(s3 ∈ dom(s1),(s1 ` s3))| s2[finSupp](0 ` s0)} ↦(s0[gsum]s5))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: reldmdprd
blocks.content: The domain of the internal direct product operation is a relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldmdprd() {
  |- wrel(cdm(cdprd))
} = {
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cdprd, cgrp, cab(hs2, wa(wf(cv(hs2), cdm(cv(hs2)), cfv(csubg, cv(hs0))), wral(hs3, cdm(cv(hs2)), wa(wral(hs4, cdif(cdm(cv(hs2)), csn(cv(hs3))), wss(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs4))))), wceq(cin(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs3)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, cv(hs0))), cuni(cima(cv(hs2), cdif(cdm(cv(hs2)), csn(cv(hs3))))))), csn(cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))))))), crn(cmpt(hs5, crab(hs2, cixp(hs3, cdm(cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs3))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, cv(hs0)))), co(cv(hs0), cgsu, cv(hs5)))))
  df-dprd(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reldmdprd() {
  ⊢ Rel(dom(DProd))
} = {
  reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cdprd, cgrp, { hs2 |((hs2 : dom(hs2)→(SubGrp ` hs0))∧ ∀(hs3 ∈ dom(hs2),(∀(hs4 ∈(dom(hs2)\ { hs3 }),(hs2 ` hs3)⊆((Cntz ` hs0)`(hs2 ` hs4)))∧((hs2 ` hs3)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` hs0))` ⋃(hs2 "(dom(hs2)\ { hs3 }))))= {(0 ` hs0)})))}, ran((hs5 ∈ { hs2 ∈ ×(hs3 ∈ dom(hs1),(hs1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` hs0)} ↦(hs0[gsum]hs5))))
  df-dprd(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, hs4, hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.s(hs5)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
}

blocks.name: dmdprd
blocks.content: The domain of definition of the internal direct product, which states that ` S ` is a family of subgroups that mutually commute and have trivial intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)

  diff.hs0.w(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c0)∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.w(((c2 : c0 →(SubGrp ` c3))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(∀(s1 ∈(c0 \ { s0 }),(c2 ` s0)⊆(c4 `(c2 ` s1)))∧((c2 ` s0)⋂(c5 ` ⋃(c2 "(c0 \ { s0 }))))= { c6 }))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c0), hs0 = c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c1, dom(c2)= c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, dom(c2), c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ dom(c2)= c0), hs0 = c2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈ c1, dom(c2)= c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)

  diff.hs3.c(universe)

blocks.name: dmdprdd
blocks.content: Show that a given family is a direct product decomposition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)

thm dmdprdd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)), wral(s0, c5, wa(wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c5, w0, wa(wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))
  ralrimiv(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  syl5bi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  eldifsn(cv(s1), c5, cv(s0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  necom(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  imp4b(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  3exp2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  eqssd(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  snssd(c3, cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  elind(c3, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c5, c1, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  subg0cl(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c0, c3)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c3, cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), wcel(cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))
  sstrd(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(csubg, c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  syl5ss(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(csubg, c0), crn(c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  imassrn(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wss(crn(c1), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  frnd(c1, cfv(csubg, c0), c5, w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wss(cfv(csubg, c0), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  3syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  subgacs(c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  acsmre(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  mresspw(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  sspwuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(cbs, c0))
  mrccl(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))), c4)
  subg0cl(cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0)))))), c0, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cgrp), wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)), wral(s0, c5, wa(wral(s1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cfv(c1, cv(s1))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cdif(c5, csn(cv(s0))))))), csn(c3)))))), wcel(c5, c6), wceq(cdm(c1), c5))
  fdmd(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  dmdprd(s0, s1, c5, c6, c1, c0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c5)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmdprdd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c5 →(SubGrp ` c0)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5 ∧ s0 ≠ s1))→(c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5)→((c1 ` s0)⋂(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))⊆ { c3 })
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, c0[dom(DProd)]c1, c0 ∈ Grp, (c1 : c5 →(SubGrp ` c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(∀(s1 ∈(c5 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))∧((c1 ` s0)⋂(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))= { c3 })))
  ralrimiva(s0, c5, w0, (∀(s1 ∈(c5 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))∧((c1 ` s0)⋂(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))= { c3 }))
  jca((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), ∀(s1 ∈(c5 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1))), ((c1 ` s0)⋂(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))= { c3 })
  ralrimiv(s1, (c5 \ { s0 }), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), (c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  syl5bi((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), s1 ∈(c5 \ { s0 }), (c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)), (s1 ∈ c5 ∧ s0 ≠ s1))
  bitri(s1 ∈(c5 \ { s0 }), (s1 ∈ c5 ∧ s0 ≠ s1), (s1 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ≠ s0))
  eldifsn(s1, c5, s0)
  anbi2i(s1 ∈ c5, s1 ≠ s0, s0 ≠ s1)
  necom(s1, s0)
  imp4b(w0, s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5, s0 ≠ s1, (c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  3exp2(w0, s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5, s0 ≠ s1, (c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))
  eqssd(((c1 ` s0)⋂(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })))), { c3 }, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
  snssd(c3, ((c1 ` s0)⋂(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })))), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
  elind(c3, (c1 ` s0), (c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), c3 ∈(c1 ` s0), (c1 ` s0)∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  ffvelrnda(s0, c5, c1, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  subg0cl((c1 ` s0), c0, c3)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), c3 ∈(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))), (c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })))∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), (c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (SubGrp ` c0)∈(Moore `(Base ` c0)), ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))⊆(Base ` c0))
  sylib((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))⊆(Base ` c0), (c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))⊆ P((Base ` c0)))
  sstrd((c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })), P((Base ` c0)), (SubGrp ` c0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
  syl5ss((c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })), (SubGrp ` c0), ran(c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5))
  imassrn(c1, (c5 \ { s0 }))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c5, ran(c1)⊆(SubGrp ` c0))
  frnd(c1, (SubGrp ` c0), c5, w0)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), (SubGrp ` c0)⊆ P((Base ` c0)), (SubGrp ` c0)∈(Moore `(Base ` c0)))
  3syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c5), (SubGrp ` c0)∈(Moore `(Base ` c0)), c0 ∈ Grp, (SubGrp ` c0)∈(ACS `(Base ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c5, c0 ∈ Grp)
  subgacs(c0, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  acsmre((SubGrp ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  mresspw((SubGrp ` c0), (Base ` c0))
  sspwuni((c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })), (Base ` c0))
  mrccl((SubGrp ` c0), (Base ` c0), ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 })), c4)
  subg0cl((c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))), c0, c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧(c1 : c5 →(SubGrp ` c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c5,(∀(s1 ∈(c5 \ { s0 }),(c1 ` s0)⊆(c2 `(c1 ` s1)))∧((c1 ` s0)⋂(c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c5 \ { s0 }))))= { c3 })))), c5 ∈ c6, dom(c1)= c5)
  fdmd(c1, c5, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  dmdprd(s0, s1, c5, c6, c1, c0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c5)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c5)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: dprddomprc
blocks.content: A family of subgroups indexed by a proper class cannot be a family of subgroups for an internal direct product. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dprddomcld
blocks.content: If a family of subgroups is a family of subgroups for an internal direct product, then it is indexed by a set. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dprdval0prc
blocks.content: The internal direct product of a family of subgroups indexed by a proper class is empty. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: dprdval
blocks.content: The value of the internal direct product operation, which is a function mapping the (infinite, but finitely supported) cartesian product of subgroups (which mutually commute and have trivial intersections) to its (group) sum . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprdval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s1, cixp(s2, c2, cfv(c1, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  mpd(wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cv(s0))))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  simpl(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c2))
  mpbid(wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c2)), wi(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c3, co(c0, cgsu, cv(s0)))))), wsbc(hs0, c1, wi(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cixp(s2, cdm(cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c4)), co(c0, cgsu, cv(s0))))))))

blocks.name: eldprd
blocks.content: A class ` A ` is an internal direct product iff it is the (group) sum of an infinite, but finitely supported cartesian product of subgroups (which mutually commute and have trivial intersections). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eldprd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wb(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s1, cixp(s2, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c5)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  syl5bb(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))))), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0))))
  pm4.71ri(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  sylibr(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wcel(cop(c3, c0), cdm(cdprd)))
  eleq2s(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0), cfv(cdprd, cop(c3, c0)), wcel(cop(c3, c0), cdm(cdprd)))
  elfvdm(c2, cdprd, cop(c3, c0))
  df-ov(c3, cdprd, c0)
  df-br(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0)
  pm5.32da(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))))
  ancoms(wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wb(wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))))))
  syl6bb(wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)), wcel(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0)), wrex(s0, c4, wceq(c2, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))))))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c3, cdprd, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1)))
  dprdval(s0, s1, s2, c3, c0, c1, c4, c5)
  elrnmpti(s0, c2, cmpt(s0, c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))), c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c4, co(c3, cgsu, cv(s0))))

}

thm eldprd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (dom(c0)= c1 →(c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0)↔(c3[dom(DProd)]c0 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c4, c2 =(c3[gsum]s0)))))
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 = { s1 ∈ ×(s2 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s2))| s1[finSupp]c5 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s1, s2)

} = {
  syl5bb(dom(c0)= c1, c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0), (c3[dom(DProd)]c0 ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c4, c2 =(c3[gsum]s0))), (c3[dom(DProd)]c0 ∧ c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0)))
  pm4.71ri(c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0), c3[dom(DProd)]c0)
  sylibr(c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0), c3[dom(DProd)]c0, < c3, c0 > ∈ dom(DProd))
  eleq2s(c2, (c3[DProd]c0), (DProd ` < c3, c0 >), < c3, c0 > ∈ dom(DProd))
  elfvdm(c2, cdprd, < c3, c0 >)
  df-ov(c3, cdprd, c0)
  df-br(c3, dom(DProd), c0)
  pm5.32da(dom(c0)= c1, c3[dom(DProd)]c0, c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c4, c2 =(c3[gsum]s0)))
  ancoms(dom(c0)= c1, c3[dom(DProd)]c0, (c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c4, c2 =(c3[gsum]s0))))
  syl6bb((c3[dom(DProd)]c0 ∧ dom(c0)= c1), c2 ∈(c3[DProd]c0), ∃(s0 ∈ c4, c2 =(c3[gsum]s0)), c2 ∈ ran((s0 ∈ c4 ↦(c3[gsum]s0))))
  eleq2d(c2, (c3[DProd]c0), ran((s0 ∈ c4 ↦(c3[gsum]s0))), (c3[dom(DProd)]c0 ∧ dom(c0)= c1))
  dprdval(s0, s1, s2, c3, c0, c1, c4, c5)
  elrnmpti(s0, c2, (s0 ∈ c4 ↦(c3[gsum]s0)), c4, (c3[gsum]s0))

}

thm dprdcntz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccntz, c4))
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c3, cdif(c5, csn(c1)), w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, c3))), wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  sseq2d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  2fveq3(cv(hs0), c3, c2, c0)
  rspcdva(hs1, c1, c5, w0, wral(hs0, cdif(c5, csn(c1)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs1))), wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  raleqbidv(hs0, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs1))), cdif(c5, csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  difeq2d(c5, csn(cv(hs1)), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs1), c1)
  sseq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, c0)
  syl(w0, wral(hs1, c5, wral(hs0, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs1))), wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs1, c5, wa(wral(hs0, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs1))), wss(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cin(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c4)), cuni(cima(c0, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs1))))))), csn(cfv(c0g, c4))))))

thm dprdfcntz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ran(c0)⊆(c1 ` ran(c0)))

  sseldd((c0 ` hs0), (c1 `(c4 ` hs2)), (c4 ` hs0), (((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧ hs2 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 ≠ hs2))

thm dprdssv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[DProd]c1)⊆ c2

  brrelex2i(c0, dom(DProd), c1)
  reldmdprd()

  dprdfcntz(hs2, hs3, hs1, (Cntz ` c0), { hs2 ∈ ×(hs3 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, dom(c1), c1, (0 ` c0), c0, (c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ { hs2 ∈ ×(hs3 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs3))| hs2[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))

blocks.name: dprdfid
blocks.content: A function mapping all but one arguments to zero sums to the value of this argument in a direct product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprdfid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cixp(s1, c5, cfv(c6, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c6))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c6), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(c6, c7)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3))
  eqtrd(co(c2, cgsu, c0), c3, cfv(c0, c7), w0)
  gsumpt(c2, c0, c7, cfv(cbs, c2), c4, c5, universe, w0)
  3syl(w0, wcel(c2, cmnd), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c6), wcel(c2, cgrp))
  dprdgrp(c2, c6)
  grpmnd(c2)
  dprdff(s0, s1, c0, c5, cfv(cbs, c2), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))), w0)
  dprdwd(s2, s0, s1, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  ifclda(c3, c4, cfv(c6, cv(s2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  eleqtrrd(c3, cfv(c6, cv(s2)), cfv(c6, c7), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5), wceq(cv(s2), c7), wcel(c3, cfv(c6, c7)))
  fveq2d(c6, cv(s2), c7, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wn(wceq(cv(s2), c7)), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s2))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c5)), wcel(c4, cfv(c6, cv(s2))), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s2)), cfv(csubg, c2)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s2), c5, c6, cfv(csubg, c2), w0)
  dprdf2(c6, c5, c2, w0)
  subg0cl(cfv(c6, cv(s2)), c2, c4)
  sniffsupp(s2, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))), c4, c5, universe, universe, c7, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, universe))
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  syl5eqss(co(c0, csupp, c4), csn(c7), co(cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))), csupp, c4), w0)
  oveq1i(c0, csupp, c4, cmpt(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))))
  suppss2(s2, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), c4, csn(c7), universe, w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, csn(c7)))), wceq(cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), c4), wne(cv(s2), c7))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s2), cdif(c5, csn(c7))), wne(cv(s2), c7))
  eldifsni(cv(s2), c5, c7)
  ifnefalse(cv(s2), c7, c3, c4)
  dprddomcld(c5, c2, c6, w0)
  fvmptd3(s2, c0, c7, c3, c5, cif(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7)), cfv(c6, c7), w0)
  iftrue(c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c3, c4, wceq(cv(s2), c7))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c7)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.csn.s(s2, c7)
}

thm dprdfid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2[gsum]c0)= c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c2)
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 ∈ ×(s1 ∈ c5,(c6 ` s1))| s0[finSupp]c4 }
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[dom(DProd)]c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c6)= c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c7 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c6 ` c7))
  ⊣ c0 =(s2 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c6)
  ⊣ d(s2, c7)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2[gsum]c0)= c3)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧(c2[gsum]c0)= c3)), d(s1, c2))
  jca(w0, c0 ∈ c1, (c2[gsum]c0)= c3)
  eqtrd((c2[gsum]c0), c3, (c0 ` c7), w0)
  gsumpt(c2, c0, c7, (Base ` c2), c4, c5, universe, w0)
  3syl(w0, c2 ∈ Mnd, c2[dom(DProd)]c6, c2 ∈ Grp)
  dprdgrp(c2, c6)
  grpmnd(c2)
  dprdff(s0, s1, c0, c5, (Base ` c2), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, (s2 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)), w0)
  dprdwd(s2, s0, s1, c5, if(s2 = c7, c3, c4), c1, c6, c4, c2, w0)
  ifclda(c3, c4, (c6 ` s2), (w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c5), s2 = c7)
  eleqtrrd(c3, (c6 ` s2), (c6 ` c7), ((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c5)∧ s2 = c7))
  ad2antrr(w0, s2 ∈ c5, s2 = c7, c3 ∈(c6 ` c7))
  fveq2d(c6, s2, c7, ((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c5)∧ s2 = c7))
  simpr((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c5), s2 = c7)
  adantr((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c5), ¬ s2 = c7, c4 ∈(c6 ` s2))
  syl((w0 ∧ s2 ∈ c5), c4 ∈(c6 ` s2), (c6 ` s2)∈(SubGrp ` c2))
  ffvelrnda(s2, c5, c6, (SubGrp ` c2), w0)
  dprdf2(c6, c5, c2, w0)
  subg0cl((c6 ` s2), c2, c4)
  sniffsupp(s2, (s2 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)), c4, c5, universe, universe, c7, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c2)
  eqid((s2 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  syl5eqss((c0[supp]c4), { c7 }, ((s2 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4))[supp]c4), w0)
  oveq1i(c0, csupp, c4, (s2 ∈ c5 ↦ if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)))
  suppss2(s2, c5, if(s2 = c7, c3, c4), c4, { c7 }, universe, w0)
  syl((w0 ∧ s2 ∈(c5 \ { c7 })), if(s2 = c7, c3, c4)= c4, s2 ≠ c7)
  adantl(w0, s2 ∈(c5 \ { c7 }), s2 ≠ c7)
  eldifsni(s2, c5, c7)
  ifnefalse(s2, c7, c3, c4)
  dprddomcld(c5, c2, c6, w0)
  fvmptd3(s2, c0, c7, c3, c5, if(s2 = c7, c3, c4), (c6 ` c7), w0)
  iftrue(c3, c4, s2 = c7)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cif.s(s0, c3, c4, s2 = c7)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, c7)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.csn.s(s2, c7)
}

blocks.name: eldprdi
blocks.content: The domain of definition of the internal direct product, which states that ` S ` is a family of subgroups that mutually commute and have trivial intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm eldprdi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s0, cixp(s1, c5, cfv(c2, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s0), cfsupp, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c0, cdprd, c2))), diffsc(s0, c1))

thm dprdfinv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(ccom(c0, c1), c2), wceq(co(c3, cgsu, ccom(c0, c1)), cfv(c0, co(c3, cgsu, c1)))))

  dprdwd(hs0, s0, s1, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), c2, c6, c4, c3, w0)

  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c5, c6, cfv(csubg, c3), w0)
  dprdf2(c6, c5, c3, w0)
  dprdfcl(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c5, c1, c6, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  subginvcl(cfv(c6, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), c0)
  syl22anc(w0, wbr(cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), cfsupp, c4), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), universe), wfun(cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), wbr(c1, cfsupp, c4), wss(co(cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), csupp, c4), co(c1, csupp, c4)))
  mptexd(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wfun(cmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))))
  funmpt(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  suppss2(hs0, c5, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), c4, co(c1, csupp, c4), universe, w0)

  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c4), c4), wcel(c3, cgrp))

  gsumzinv(c3, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c3), c4, cfv(ccntz, c3), c5, universe, w0)

  dprdgrp(c3, c6)
  dprddomcld(c5, c3, c6, w0)

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c3))
  dprdfcntz(s0, s1, c1, cfv(ccntz, c3), c2, c5, c6, c4, c3, w0)

  dprdffsupp(s0, s1, c1, c4, c2, c5, c6, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

thm dprdfinv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ∘ c1)∈ c2 ∧(c3[gsum](c0 ∘ c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1))))
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c3)
  ⊣ c2 = { s0 ∈ ×(s1 ∈ c5,(c6 ` s1))| s0[finSupp]c4 }
  ⊣ (w0 → c3[dom(DProd)]c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c6)= c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(invg ` c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →((c0 ∘ c1)∈ c2 ∧(c3[gsum](c0 ∘ c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1)))), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((w0 →((c0 ∘ c1)∈ c2 ∧(c3[gsum](c0 ∘ c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1)))), d(s1, c3))
  jca(w0, (c0 ∘ c1)∈ c2, (c3[gsum](c0 ∘ c1))=(c0 `(c3[gsum]c1)))
  eqeltrd((c0 ∘ c1), c2, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∘ c1)=(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0))), (c0 :(Base ` c3)→(Base ` c3)), (c1 : c5 →(Base ` c3)))
  syl(w0, (c0 :(Base ` c3)→(Base ` c3)), c3 ∈ Grp)

  fcompt(hs0, c0, (Base ` c3), (Base ` c3), c1, c5)
  dprdwd(hs0, s0, s1, c5, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), c2, c6, c4, c3, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), (c0 `(c1 ` hs0))∈(c6 ` hs0), (c6 ` hs0)∈(SubGrp ` c3), (c1 ` hs0)∈(c6 ` hs0))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c5, c6, (SubGrp ` c3), w0)
  dprdf2(c6, c5, c3, w0)
  dprdfcl(s0, s1, hs0, c5, c1, c6, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  subginvcl((c6 ` hs0), c3, (c1 ` hs0), c0)
  syl22anc(w0, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0)))[finSupp]c4, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0)))∈ 𝕌, Fun((hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0)))), c1[finSupp]c4, ((hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0)))[supp]c4)⊆(c1[supp]c4))
  mptexd(hs0, c5, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, Fun((hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0)))))
  funmpt(hs0, c5, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0)))
  suppss2(hs0, c5, (c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), c4, (c1[supp]c4), universe, w0)
  eqtrd((c0 `(c1 ` hs0)), c4, (c0 ` c4), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c5 \(c1[supp]c4))))
  fveq2d(c0, (c1 ` hs0), c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c5 \(c1[supp]c4))))
  suppssr(hs0, c5, (c1[supp]c4), c1, c4, (Base ` c3), universe, universe, w0)
  ssidd((c1[supp]c4), w0)
  a1i(w0, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c4, c0g, c3)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c5 \(c1[supp]c4)), (c0 ` c4)= c4)
  syl(w0, (c0 ` c4)= c4, c3 ∈ Grp)
  grpinvid(c3, c0, c4)
  fsuppsssupp((hs0 ∈ c5 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` hs0))), universe, c1, c4)
  gsumzinv(c3, c0, c1, (Base ` c3), c4, (Cntz ` c3), c5, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ Grp, c3[dom(DProd)]c6)

blocks.name: dprdfsub
blocks.content: Take the difference of group sums over two families of elements of disjoint subgroups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)

  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

}

blocks.name: dprdf11
blocks.content: Two group sums over a direct product that give the same value are equal as functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 14-Jul-2019.)

  simprd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, co(c1, cof(cfv(csg, c0)), c2)), co(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(csg, c0), co(c0, cgsu, c2))), wcel(co(c1, cof(cfv(csg, c0)), c2), c4))

  eqeq1d(co(c1, cof(cfv(csg, c0)), c2), cmpt(hs0, c5, c3), cmpt(hs0, c5, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  offval2(hs0, c1, cfv(csg, c0), c2, c5, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), universe, universe, universe, w0)
  dprddomcld(c5, c0, c6, w0)
  fvexd(c1, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  fvexd(c2, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  feqmptd(hs0, c1, c5, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c2, c5, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  syl5bb(w0, wceq(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, c5, c3)), wral(hs0, c5, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, c5, wceq(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), c3)))
  ax-mp(wb(wceq(cmpt(hs0, c5, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs0, c5, c3)), wral(hs0, c5, wceq(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), c3))), wral(hs0, c5, wcel(co(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(csg, c0), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), universe)))

thm dprdf11(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum]c2)↔ c1 = c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 = { s0 ∈ ×(s1 ∈ c5,(c6 ` s1))| s0[finSupp]c3 }
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c6)= c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
} = {
  3bitr2rd(w0, (c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum]c2), c1 = c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,(c1 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)), ((c0[gsum]c1)[(-g ` c0)](c0[gsum]c2))= c3)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1 = c2 ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,(c1 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0))), c1[Fn]c5, c2[Fn]c5)
  ffnd(c1, c5, (Base ` c0), w0)
  ffnd(c2, c5, (Base ` c0), w0)
  eqfnfv(hs0, c1, c5, c2)
  3bitr3d(w0, ((c0[gsum]c1)[(-g ` c0)](c0[gsum]c2))= c3, ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,(c1 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)), (c0[gsum](c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2))= c3, (c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2)=(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c3))
  dprdfeq0(hs0, s0, s1, c0, (c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2), c3, c5, c4, c6, w0)
  simpld(w0, (c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2)∈ c4, (c0[gsum](c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2))=((c0[gsum]c1)[(-g ` c0)](c0[gsum]c2)))
  eqeq1d((c0[gsum](c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2)), c3, ((c0[gsum]c1)[(-g ` c0)](c0[gsum]c2)), w0)
  simprd(w0, (c0[gsum](c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2))=((c0[gsum]c1)[(-g ` c0)](c0[gsum]c2)), (c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2)∈ c4)
  dprdfsub(s0, s1, c1, (-g ` c0), c2, c4, c0, c3, c5, c6, w0)
  bitrd(w0, (c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2)=(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c3), ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,(c1 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)), (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0)))=(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c3))
  eqeq1d((c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2), (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c3), (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0))), w0)
  offval2(hs0, c1, (-g ` c0), c2, c5, (c1 ` hs0), (c2 ` hs0), universe, universe, universe, w0)
  dprddomcld(c5, c0, c6, w0)
  fvexd(c1, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  fvexd(c2, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5))
  feqmptd(hs0, c1, c5, (Base ` c0), w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c2, c5, (Base ` c0), w0)
  syl5bb(w0, (hs0 ∈ c5 ↦((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0)))=(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c3), ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,(c1 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0))= c3))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ c5 ↦((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0)))=(hs0 ∈ c5 ↦ c3)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0))= c3)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c5,((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0))∈ 𝕌))
  rgenw(hs0, c5, ((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0))∈ 𝕌)
  ovex((c1 ` hs0), (-g ` c0), (c2 ` hs0))
  mpteqb(hs0, c5, ((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0)), universe, c3)
  ralbidva(hs0, c5, w0, ((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0))= c3, (c1 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c5), (((c1 ` hs0)[(-g ` c0)](c2 ` hs0))= c3 ↔(c1 ` hs0)=(c2 ` hs0)), c0 ∈ Grp, (c1 ` hs0)∈(Base ` c0), (c2 ` hs0)∈(Base ` c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, c0 ∈ Grp)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c5, c1, (Base ` c0), w0)
  dprdff(s0, s1, c1, c5, (Base ` c0), c4, c6, c3, c0, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c5, c2, (Base ` c0), w0)
  dprdff(s0, s1, c2, c5, (Base ` c0), c4, c6, c3, c0, w0)
  grpsubeq0(c0, (c1 ` hs0), (Base ` c0), (c2 ` hs0), (-g ` c0), c3)
  syl3anc(w0, (((c0[gsum]c1)[(-g ` c0)](c0[gsum]c2))= c3 ↔(c0[gsum]c1)=(c0[gsum]c2)), c0 ∈ Grp, (c0[gsum]c1)∈(Base ` c0), (c0[gsum]c2)∈(Base ` c0))
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Grp, c0[dom(DProd)]c6)
  dprdgrp(c0, c6)
  sseldi((c0[gsum]c1), (Base ` c0), (c0[DProd]c6), w0)
  eldprdi(s0, s1, c0, c1, c6, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  sseldi((c0[gsum]c2), (Base ` c0), (c0[DProd]c6), w0)
  dprdssv(c0, c6, (Base ` c0))
  eldprdi(s0, s1, c0, c2, c6, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  grpsubeq0(c0, (c0[gsum]c1), (Base ` c0), (c0[gsum]c2), (-g ` c0), c3)
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((-g ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1[oF((-g ` c0))]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, oF((-g ` c0)), c2)
  diff.cof.s(s0, (-g ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csg, c0)
  diff.csg.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c((-g ` c0))
}

blocks.name: dprdsubg
blocks.content: The internal direct product of a family of subgroups is a subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprdsubg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(csubg, c0)))
} = {

  a1i(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wss(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  dprdssv(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  ne0d(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c0, cgsu, cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  eldprdi(hs2, hs3, c0, cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), c1, cfv(c0g, c0), crab(hs2, cixp(hs3, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs3))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0))), cdm(c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  mpbir3and(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), crab(hs2, cixp(hs3, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs3))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0)))), wfn(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cdm(c1)), wral(hs4, cdm(c1), wcel(cfv(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cv(hs4)), cfv(c1, cv(hs4)))), wbr(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  mp1i(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wfn(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cdm(c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), universe))
  fnconstg(cfv(c0g, c0), universe, cdm(c1))
  ralrimiva(hs4, cdm(c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cfv(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cv(hs4)), cfv(c1, cv(hs4))))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cv(hs4)), cfv(c1, cv(hs4)), cfv(c0g, c0), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cv(hs4), cdm(c1))))
  adantl(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cv(hs4), cdm(c1)), wceq(cfv(cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), cv(hs4)), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  fvconst2(cv(hs4), cdm(c1), cfv(c0g, c0))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cv(hs4), cdm(c1))), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), cfv(c1, cv(hs4))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(hs4)), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs4), cdm(c1), c1, cfv(csubg, c0), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dprdf(c0, c1)
  subg0cl(cfv(c1, cv(hs4)), c0, cfv(c0g, c0))
  fczfsuppd(cdm(c1), cfv(c0g, c0), universe, universe, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  con4i(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cdm(c1), universe))
  sylbir(wn(wcel(cdm(c1), universe)), wn(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1)), wnel(cdm(c1), universe))
  df-nel(cdm(c1), universe)
  dprddomprc(c1, c0)
  a1i(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), universe))
  fvex(c0g, c0)
  dprdw(hs4, hs2, hs3, cxp(cdm(c1), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))), crab(hs2, cixp(hs3, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs3))), wbr(cv(hs2), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c0))), cdm(c1), c1, cfv(c0g, c0), c0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  id(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))

  frnd((hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)} ↦(c0[gsum]hs0)), c2, { hs1 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, w0)
  fmpttd(hs0, { hs1 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, (c0[gsum]hs0), c2, w0)
  gsumzsubmcl(c0, hs0, c2, (0 ` c0), (Cntz ` c0), c3, universe, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  3syl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}), c0 ∈ Mnd, c0[dom(DProd)]c1, c0 ∈ Grp)

  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)}, c2 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  subgsubm(c2, c0)

  eqid((Base ` c0))

  sseldd((hs0 ` s0), c2, (c1 ` s0), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { hs1 ∈ ×(hs2 ∈ c3,(c1 ` hs2))| hs1[finSupp](0 ` c0)})∧ s0 ∈ c3))

} = {

  dprdlub(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(c2, cuni(crn(c1))), cdm(c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))

  sylib(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1), wral(hs0, cdm(c1), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cuni(crn(c1)))), wss(ciun(hs0, cdm(c1), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), cuni(crn(c1))))

  syl6ss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c0), co(c0, cdprd, c1), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))

thm dprdspan(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[dom(DProd)]c1 →(c0[DProd]c1)=(c2 ` ⋃ ran(c1)))
  ⊣ c2 =(mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))

  mrccl((SubGrp ` c0), (Base ` c0), ⋃ ran(c1), c2)

  sylib(c0[dom(DProd)]c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs0)⊆ ⋃ ran(c1)), ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs0))⊆ ⋃ ran(c1))
  syl(c0[dom(DProd)]c1, ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs0))⊆ ⋃ ran(c1), ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs0))= ⋃ ran(c1))

  iunss(hs0, dom(c1), (c1 ` hs0), ⋃ ran(c1))

  dprdssv(c0, c1, (Base ` c0))

  eqsstr3d(⋃ ran(c1), (c0[DProd]c1), ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs0)), c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  syl(c0[dom(DProd)]c1, ⋃(hs0 ∈ dom(c1),(c1 ` hs0))= ⋃ ran(c1), c1[Fn]dom(c1))
  ffnd(c1, dom(c1), (SubGrp ` c0), c0[dom(DProd)]c1)

  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c1)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ c3)
} = {
  jca(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))
  3sstr4d((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), (c0[DProd]c1), ((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃ ran((c1 |` c2))), ((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃ ran(c1)), w0)
  mrcssd((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0)), ⋃ ran((c1 |` c2)), ⋃ ran(c1), (SubGrp ` c0), (Base ` c0), w0)

  mp2b(⋃ ran((c1 |` c2))⊆ ⋃ ran(c1), (c1 |` c2)⊆ c1, ran((c1 |` c2))⊆ ran(c1))
  rnss((c1 |` c2), c1)
  uniss(ran((c1 |` c2)), ran(c1))
  sylib(w0, ⋃ ran(c1)⊆(Base ` c0), ran(c1)⊆ P((Base ` c0)))
  sspwuni(ran(c1), (Base ` c0))
  syl(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))=((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃ ran((c1 |` c2))), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2))
  mpbir3and(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2), c0 ∈ Grp, ((c1 |` c2): c2 →(SubGrp ` c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(∀(hs1 ∈(c2 \ { hs0 }),((c1 |` c2)` hs0)⊆((Cntz ` c0)`((c1 |` c2)` hs1)))∧(((c1 |` c2)` hs0)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃((c1 |` c2)"(c2 \ { hs0 }))))= {(0 ` c0)})))

blocks.name: dprdss
blocks.content: Create a direct product by finding subgroups inside each factor of another direct product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dprdz
blocks.content: A family consisting entirely of trivial groups is an internal direct product, the product of which is the trivial subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: dprd0
blocks.content: The empty family is an internal direct product, the product of which is the trivial subgroup. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dprd0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, emptycls), csn(c1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, emptycls), csn(c1))), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1))))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cgrp), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1))), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  dprdz(hs0, c0, emptycls, universe, c1)
  anbi12i(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), emptycls), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, emptycls), csn(c1)))
  breq2i(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1)), emptycls)
  eqeq1i(co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1))), csn(c1), co(c0, cdprd, emptycls))
  oveq2i(c0, cdprd, cmpt(hs0, emptycls, csn(c1)), emptycls)
  mpt0(hs0, csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.content: Rearrange the index set of a direct product family. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

thm dprdf1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf1(c2, c4, c3))
} = {
  jca(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  syl6breq(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(c1, c2), ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2), w0)
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2)))))
  eqsstrd(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), w0)
  syl5eqr(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), co(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), w0)
  oveq2i(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2), ccom(c1, c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2), ccom(c1, c2)), wss(crn(c2), crn(c2)))
  ssid(crn(c2))
  cores(c2, crn(c2), c1)
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2)))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), ccom(cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2)))
  dprdf1o(c0, cres(c1, crn(c2)), c2, crn(c2), c4, w0)
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, crn(c2))), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  fdmd(cres(c1, crn(c2)), crn(c2), cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, crn(c2), cfv(csubg, c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wf1o(c2, c4, crn(c2)), wf1(c2, c4, c3))
  f1f1orn(c2, c4, c3)
  simprd(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, crn(c2))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, crn(c2))))
  dprdres(c0, c1, crn(c2), c3, w0)
  3syl(w0, wss(crn(c2), c3), wf1(c2, c4, c3), wf(c2, c4, c3))
  f1f(c2, c4, c3)
  frn(c2, c4, c3)
}

thm dprdf1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[dom(DProd)](c1 ∘ c2)∧(c0[DProd](c1 ∘ c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c1)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 : c4 ↣ c3))
} = {
  jca(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 ∘ c2), (c0[DProd](c1 ∘ c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))
  syl6breq(c0, dom(DProd), (c1 ∘ c2), ((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2), w0)
  simpld(w0, c0[dom(DProd)]((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2), (c0[DProd]((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2))=(c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))))
  eqsstrd((c0[DProd](c1 ∘ c2)), (c0[DProd]c1), (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))), w0)
  syl5eqr((c0[DProd](c1 ∘ c2)), (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))), (c0[DProd]((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2)), w0)
  oveq2i(c0, cdprd, ((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2), (c1 ∘ c2))
  ax-mp(((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2)=(c1 ∘ c2), ran(c2)⊆ ran(c2))
  ssid(ran(c2))
  cores(c2, ran(c2), c1)
  simprd(w0, (c0[DProd]((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2))=(c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2))), c0[dom(DProd)]((c1 |` ran(c2))∘ c2))
  dprdf1o(c0, (c1 |` ran(c2)), c2, ran(c2), c4, w0)
  simpld(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` ran(c2)), (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2)))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))
  fdmd((c1 |` ran(c2)), ran(c2), (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, ran(c2), (SubGrp ` c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2 : c4 ↔ ran(c2)), (c2 : c4 ↣ c3))
  f1f1orn(c2, c4, c3)
  simprd(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` ran(c2)))⊆(c0[DProd]c1), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` ran(c2)))
  dprdres(c0, c1, ran(c2), c3, w0)
  3syl(w0, ran(c2)⊆ c3, (c2 : c4 ↣ c3), (c2 : c4 → c3))
  f1f(c2, c4, c3)
  frn(c2, c4, c3)
}

thm subgdmdprd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)→(c2[dom(DProd)]c3 ↔(c1[dom(DProd)]c3 ∧ ran(c3)⊆ P(c0))))
  ⊣ c2 =(c1[|`s]c0)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1), c2[dom(DProd)]c3, (c1[dom(DProd)]c3 ∧ ran(c3)⊆ P(c0)), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1), (c2[dom(DProd)]c3 → c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  brrelex2i(c2, dom(DProd), c3)
  a1i(c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1), ((c1[dom(DProd)]c3 ∧ ran(c3)⊆ P(c0))→ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  adantr(c1[dom(DProd)]c3, ran(c3)⊆ P(c0), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex2i(c1, dom(DProd), c3)

thm subgdprd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c1)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c1))

} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c1), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), w0)

  mrcssidd(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), w0)
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), c3))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c2))), wss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  sylib(w0, wss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wss(crn(c1), cpw(cfv(cbs, c2))))
  sstrd(crn(c1), cpw(cfv(cbs, c2)), cfv(csubg, c2), w0)
  3syl(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(csubg, c2)), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c1), wf(c1, cdm(c1), cfv(csubg, c2)))

  frn(c1, cdm(c1), cfv(csubg, c2))
  syl(w0, wss(cfv(csubg, c2), cpw(cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c2))))
  mresspw(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
  sspwuni(crn(c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  mrccl(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  syl3anc(w0, wss(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), c3), wcel(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c2))), wss(cuni(crn(c1)), c3), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  sylib(w0, wss(cuni(crn(c1)), c3), wss(crn(c1), cpw(c3)))
  sspwuni(crn(c1), c3)
  mrcsscl(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), cuni(crn(c1)), c3, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), c3))), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  subsubg(c3, c2, cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), c0)
  mrcsscl(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl3anc(w0, wss(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c2))), wss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c2)))
  3syl(w0, wcel(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c2))), wcel(c2, cgrp), wcel(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c2))))

  subgacs(c2, cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))

  mrcssidd(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), c3))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), c3)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  sylib(w0, wss(cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cbs, c0)), wss(crn(c1), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))))
  sstrd(crn(c1), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  frnd(c1, cfv(csubg, c0), cdm(c1), w0)
  dprdf2(c1, cdm(c1), c0, w0)
  eqidd(cdm(c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cfv(csubg, c0), cpw(cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))))
  3syl(w0, wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cmre, cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cacs, cfv(cbs, c0))))

  subggrp(c3, c2, c0)
  subgacs(c0, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  acsmre(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  mresspw(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
  sspwuni(crn(c1), cfv(cbs, c0))
  mrccl(cfv(csubg, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wa(wcel(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), c3))), wcel(c3, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  subsubg(c3, c2, cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), c0)
  mrcsscl(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cbs, c2), cuni(crn(c1)), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c2)))

thm subgdprd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[DProd]c1)=(c2[DProd]c1))
  ⊣ c0 =(c2[|`s]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(SubGrp ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ran(c1)⊆ P(c3))
} = {

  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ⊆ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋂ c4)= ∅)
  ⊣ c3 =(Cntz ` c0)
} = {
  dprdlub(hs0, c0, (c1 |` c2), (c3 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), c2, w0)
  simpld(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))

  dprdssv(c0, (c1 |` c4), (Base ` c0))

  ffvelrnda(hs0, c5, c1, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)

blocks.content: The direct product of a collection of direct products. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)

  -| wi(w0, wrel(c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c3), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(s0, c2, co(c0, cdprd, cmpt(s1, cima(c3, csn(cv(s0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))))), cfv(c4, cuni(crn(c1))), cfv(c4, cuni(cima(c1, cres(c3, c2)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(c4, cuni(crn(c1)))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dprd2da(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c2, c4, w0)
  dprdspan(c0, c1, c4)
  fveq2d(c4, cuni(crn(c1)), cuni(cima(c1, cres(c3, c2))), w0)
  unieqd(crn(c1), cima(c1, cres(c3, c2)), w0)
  eqtr2d(crn(c1), cima(c1, cres(c3, c2)), cima(c1, c3), w0)
  imaeq2d(c1, cres(c3, c2), c3, w0)

  relssres(c3, c2)

  ffn(c1, c3, cfv(csubg, c0))
  fnima(c1, c3)
  dprd2dlem1(s0, s1, c4, c1, c3, c2, c0, c2, w0)

thm dprd2db(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[DProd]c1)=(c0[DProd](s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[DProd](s1 ∈(c3 " { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1))))))
  ⊣ (w0 → Rel(c3))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c3 →(SubGrp ` c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c3)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c0[dom(DProd)](s1 ∈(c3 " { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)](s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[DProd](s1 ∈(c3 " { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1)))))
  ⊣ c4 =(mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[DProd]c1), (c0[DProd](s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0[DProd](s1 ∈(c3 " { s0 })↦(s0[c1]s1))))), (c4 ` ⋃ ran(c1)), (c4 ` ⋃(c1 "(c3 |` c2))), w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[DProd]c1)=(c4 ` ⋃ ran(c1)), c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  dprd2da(s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c2, c4, w0)
  dprdspan(c0, c1, c4)
  fveq2d(c4, ⋃ ran(c1), ⋃(c1 "(c3 |` c2)), w0)
  unieqd(ran(c1), (c1 "(c3 |` c2)), w0)
  eqtr2d(ran(c1), (c1 "(c3 |` c2)), (c1 " c3), w0)
  imaeq2d(c1, (c3 |` c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 |` c2)= c3, Rel(c3), dom(c3)⊆ c2)
  relssres(c3, c2)
  3syl(w0, (c1 " c3)= ran(c1), (c1 : c3 →(SubGrp ` c0)), c1[Fn]c3)
  ffn(c1, c3, (SubGrp ` c0))
  fnima(c1, c3)
  dprd2dlem1(s0, s1, c4, c1, c3, c2, c0, c2, w0)
  ssidd(c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: dmdprdsplit2
blocks.content: The direct product splits into the direct product of any partition of the index set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmdprdsplit2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c3, c4), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cun(c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ccntz, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c3)), cfv(c5, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c3)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), csn(c6)))
} = {
  dmdprdd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c5, c6, cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubg, c0)), c2, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c3)))
  dprdgrp(c0, cres(c1, c3))
  eqeltrd(c2, universe, cun(c3, c4), w0)

thm dmdprdsplit2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 →(SubGrp ` c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 ⋂ c4)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 =(c3 ⋃ c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))⊆(c5 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  ⊣ (w0 →((c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))= { c6 })
} = {
  dmdprdd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c5, c6, (mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0)), c2, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ Grp, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3))
  dprdgrp(c0, (c1 |` c3))
  eqeltrd(c2, universe, (c3 ⋃ c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 ⋃ c4)∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  dprddomcld(c3, c0, (c1 |` c3), w0)
  fdmd((c1 |` c3), c3, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, c3, (SubGrp ` c0), c2, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c2, (c3 ⋃ c4), w0)
  ssun1(c3, c4)
  dprddomcld(c4, c0, (c1 |` c4), w0)
  fdmd((c1 |` c4), c4, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, c4, (SubGrp ` c0), c2, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c4, c2, (c3 ⋃ c4), w0)
  ssun2(c4, c3)
  unexg(c3, universe, c4, universe)
  3imp2(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c2, hs0 ≠ hs1, (c1 ` hs0)⊆(c5 `(c1 ` hs1)))
  sylbid(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, (hs1 ∈ c2 →(hs0 ≠ hs1 →(c1 ` hs0)⊆(c5 `(c1 ` hs1)))), (hs0 ∈ c3 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4))
  ex(w0, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4), (hs1 ∈ c2 →(hs0 ≠ hs1 →(c1 ` hs0)⊆(c5 `(c1 ` hs1)))))
  simpld((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c3 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4)), (hs1 ∈ c2 →(hs0 ≠ hs1 →(c1 ` hs0)⊆(c5 `(c1 ` hs1)))), ((c1 ` hs0)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃(c1 "(c2 \ { hs0 }))))⊆ { c6 })
  jaodan(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈ c4, ((hs1 ∈ c2 →(hs0 ≠ hs1 →(c1 ` hs0)⊆(c5 `(c1 ` hs1))))∧((c1 ` hs0)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃(c1 "(c2 \ { hs0 }))))⊆ { c6 }))
  syldan(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, ((c1 ` hs0)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃(c1 "(c2 \ { hs0 }))))⊆ { c6 }, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4))
  biimpa(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4))
  syl6bb(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, (hs0 ∈ c3 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈(c3 ⋃ c4))
  eleq2d(hs0, c2, (c3 ⋃ c4), w0)
  elun(hs0, c3, c4)
  jaodan(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, hs0 ∈ c4, ((c1 ` hs0)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃(c1 "(c2 \ { hs0 }))))⊆ { c6 })
  simprd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), ((c1 ` hs0)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃(c1 "(c2 \ { hs0 }))))⊆ { c6 }, (hs1 ∈ c2 →(hs0 ≠ hs1 →(c1 ` hs0)⊆(c5 `(c1 ` hs1)))))
  dmdprdsplit2lem(hs0, c3, hs1, c2, c1, c5, (mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0)), c6, c0, c4, w0)
  simprd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), ((c1 ` hs0)⋂((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))` ⋃(c1 "(c2 \ { hs0 }))))⊆ { c6 }, (hs1 ∈ c2 →(hs0 ≠ hs1 →(c1 ` hs0)⊆(c5 `(c1 ` hs1)))))
  dmdprdsplit2lem(hs0, c4, hs1, c2, c1, c5, (mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0)), c6, c0, c3, w0)
  syl5eqr((c4 ⋂ c3), emptycls, (c3 ⋂ c4), w0)
  incom(c3, c4)
  syl6eq(c2, (c4 ⋃ c3), (c3 ⋃ c4), w0)
  uncom(c3, c4)
  cntzrecd((c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), c5, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)), c0, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))∈(SubGrp ` c0), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3))
  dprdsubg(c0, (c1 |` c3))
  syl(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))∈(SubGrp ` c0), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4))
  dprdsubg(c0, (c1 |` c4))
  syl5eqr(((c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))), { c6 }, ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), w0)
  incom((c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))
  eqid((mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.content: The direct product splits into the direct product of any partition of the index set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

  simpr1r(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c3)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(c4, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c3)))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c3))), csn(c5)))

thm dmdprdsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[dom(DProd)]c1 ↔((c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2)∧ c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3))∧(c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c4 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)))∧((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)))= { c5 })))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c6 →(SubGrp ` c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 =(c2 ⋃ c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Cntz ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c0)
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0[dom(DProd)]c1, ((c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2)∧ c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3))∧(c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c4 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)))∧((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)))= { c5 }))
  3jca((w0 ∧ c0[dom(DProd)]c1), (c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2)∧ c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3)), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c4 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)))= { c5 })
  jca((w0 ∧ c0[dom(DProd)]c1), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3))
  simpld((w0 ∧ c0[dom(DProd)]c1), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))
  dprdres(c0, c1, c2, c6, (w0 ∧ c0[dom(DProd)]c1))
  simpld((w0 ∧ c0[dom(DProd)]c1), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))
  dprdres(c0, c1, c3, c6, (w0 ∧ c0[dom(DProd)]c1))
  dprdcntz2(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c6, (w0 ∧ c0[dom(DProd)]c1))

  simpr1r(w0, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c3), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c4 `(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3))), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c3)))= { c5 })

blocks.name: dprdsplit
blocks.content: The direct product is the binary subgroup product ("sum") of the direct products of the partition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)

thm dprdsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c4), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cun(c2, c4)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsm, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), w0)
  dprdlub(hs0, c0, c1, co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  simp2d(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), csn(cfv(c0g, c0))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4))), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c0), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), csn(cfv(c0g, c0)))), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dmdprdsplit(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(ccntz, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  lsmsubg(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c0, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(ccntz, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c0))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  syl6bb(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c2, c4)))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c5, cun(c2, c4), w0)
  elun(cv(hs0), c2, c4)
  jaodan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wss(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  sstrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(cres(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(cres(c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  dprdub(cres(c1, c2), cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cdm(cres(c1, c2)), c2))
  fdmd(cres(c1, c2), c2, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, c2, cfv(csubg, c0), c5, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  lsmub1(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c0, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), c3)
  sstrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(cres(c1, c4), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(cres(c1, c4), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), c4, c1)
  dprdub(cres(c1, c4), cv(hs0), c0, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cdm(cres(c1, c4)), c4))
  fdmd(cres(c1, c4), c4, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, c4, cfv(csubg, c0), c5, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)))), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  lsmub2(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c0, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), c3)
  mpbi2and(w0, wss(co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  simprd(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)))
  simprd(w0, wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wa(wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1))), wss(co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))), co(c0, cdprd, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)))
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c2)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  dprdres(c0, c1, c2, c5, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c2, c5, cun(c2, c4), w0)
  ssun1(c2, c4)
  dprdsubg(c0, cres(c1, c2))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), cfv(csubg, c0)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)))
  simpld(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), cres(c1, c4)), wss(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1)))
  dprdres(c0, c1, c4, c5, w0)
  fdmd(c1, c5, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  syl5sseqr(c4, c5, cun(c2, c4), w0)
  ssun2(c4, c2)
  dprdsubg(c0, cres(c1, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, cdprd, c1), cfv(csubg, c0)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  dprdsubg(c0, c1)
  lsmlub(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c0, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4)), co(c0, cdprd, c1), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c2)), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

thm dprdsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[DProd]c1)=((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c5 →(SubGrp ` c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋂ c4)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 =(c2 ⋃ c4))
  ⊣ c3 =(LSSum ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
} = {
  eqssd((c0[DProd]c1), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), w0)
  dprdlub(hs0, c0, c1, ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆((Cntz ` c0)`(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  simp2d(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆((Cntz ` c0)`(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2)∧ c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4)), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))= {(0 ` c0)})
  mpbid(w0, ((c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2)∧ c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4))∧(c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆((Cntz ` c0)`(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))∧((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⋂(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))= {(0 ` c0)}), c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  dmdprdsplit(c0, c1, c2, c4, (Cntz ` c0), (0 ` c0), c5, w0)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  lsmsubg((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), c0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), (Cntz ` c0), c3)
  eqid((Cntz ` c0))
  syldan(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, (c1 ` hs0)⊆((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (hs0 ∈ c2 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4))
  biimpa(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4))
  syl6bb(w0, hs0 ∈ c5, (hs0 ∈ c2 ∨ hs0 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈(c2 ⋃ c4))
  eleq2d(hs0, c5, (c2 ⋃ c4), w0)
  elun(hs0, c2, c4)
  jaodan(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ c4, (c1 ` hs0)⊆((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  sstrd((c1 ` hs0), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  eqsstr3d((c1 ` hs0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), ((c1 |` c2)` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, ((c1 |` c2)` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  fvres(hs0, c2, c1)
  dprdub((c1 |` c2), hs0, c0, c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, dom((c1 |` c2))= c2)
  fdmd((c1 |` c2), c2, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  fssresd(c1, c2, (SubGrp ` c0), c5, w0)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  lsmub1((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), c0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), c3)
  sstrd((c1 ` hs0), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  eqsstr3d((c1 ` hs0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), ((c1 |` c4)` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))

  syl2anc(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))⊆((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  lsmub2((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2)), c0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)), c3)
  mpbi2and(w0, ((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))⊆(c0[DProd]c1), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))
  simprd(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2))
  simprd(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))⊆(c0[DProd]c1), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c4))
  syl3anc(w0, (((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))⊆(c0[DProd]c1)∧(c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))⊆(c0[DProd]c1))↔((c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |` c4)))⊆(c0[DProd]c1)), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[DProd](c1 |` c4))∈(SubGrp ` c0), (c0[DProd]c1)∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  syl(w0, (c0[DProd](c1 |` c2))∈(SubGrp ` c0), c0[dom(DProd)](c1 |` c2))

  xpsc1(c2, cfv(csubg, c0), c1)
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c1o, c2))), c2), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), csn(cop(c1o, c2))))
  sylancr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), csn(cop(c1o, c2))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c1o, c2))), c2)), wcel(c1o, con0), wcel(c2, cfv(csubg, c0)))
  1on()
  dprdsn(c1o, con0, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: dpjlem
blocks.content: Lemma for theorems about direct product projection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2))), cfv(c1, c2), co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cres(c1, csn(c2)), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), wfn(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  ffnd(c1, c3, cfv(csubg, c0), w0)
  fnressn(c1, c3, c2)
  simprd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), cfv(c1, c2)), wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wa(wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), wceq(co(c0, cdprd, csn(cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), cfv(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cfv(csubg, c0)))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, cfv(csubg, c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  dprdsn(c2, c3, cfv(c1, c2), c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dpjlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[DProd](c1 |` { c2 }))=(c1 ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c1)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[DProd](c1 |` { c2 })), (c1 ` c2), (c0[DProd]{ < c2,(c1 ` c2)> }), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cdprd, (c1 |` { c2 }), { < c2,(c1 ` c2)> }, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1 |` { c2 })= { < c2,(c1 ` c2)> }, c1[Fn]c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  ffnd(c1, c3, (SubGrp ` c0), w0)
  fnressn(c1, c3, c2)
  simprd(w0, (c0[DProd]{ < c2,(c1 ` c2)> })=(c1 ` c2), c0[dom(DProd)]{ < c2,(c1 ` c2)> })
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[dom(DProd)]{ < c2,(c1 ` c2)> } ∧(c0[DProd]{ < c2,(c1 ` c2)> })=(c1 ` c2)), c2 ∈ c3, (c1 ` c2)∈(SubGrp ` c0))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, (SubGrp ` c0), c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  dprdsn(c2, c3, (c1 ` c2), c0)
}

blocks.name: dpjcntz
blocks.content: The two subgroups that appear in ~ dpjval commute. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjcntz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ccntz, c3))
} = {
  eqsstr3d(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), w0)
  dpjlem(c3, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wss(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))), wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), wceq(cin(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), csn(cfv(c0g, c3))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wa(wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), wss(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(c2, co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))), wceq(cin(co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c3, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), csn(cfv(c0g, c3)))), wbr(c3, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  dmdprdsplit(c3, c0, csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1)), c2, cfv(c0g, c3), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c0, c4, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c4)
  syl5req(c4, cun(csn(c1), cdif(c4, csn(c1))), cun(csn(c1), c4), w0)
  undif2(csn(c1), c4)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c1), c4), c4), wss(csn(c1), c4))
  snssd(c1, c4, w0)
  ssequn1(csn(c1), c4)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dpjcntz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)⊆(c2 `(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3[dom(DProd)]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c0)= c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(Cntz ` c3)
} = {
  eqsstr3d((c0 ` c1), (c2 `(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), (c3[DProd](c0 |` { c1 })), w0)
  dpjlem(c3, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  simp2d(w0, (c3[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⊆(c2 `(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), (c3[dom(DProd)](c0 |` { c1 })∧ c3[dom(DProd)](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))), ((c3[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⋂(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))= {(0 ` c3)})
  mpbid(w0, ((c3[dom(DProd)](c0 |` { c1 })∧ c3[dom(DProd)](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))∧(c3[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⊆(c2 `(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))∧((c3[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⋂(c3[DProd](c0 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))= {(0 ` c3)}), c3[dom(DProd)]c0)
  dmdprdsplit(c3, c0, { c1 }, (c4 \ { c1 }), c2, (0 ` c3), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c0, c4, c3, w0)
  a1i(w0, ({ c1 } ⋂(c4 \ { c1 }))= ∅)
  disjdif({ c1 }, c4)
  syl5req(c4, ({ c1 } ⋃(c4 \ { c1 })), ({ c1 } ⋃ c4), w0)
  undif2({ c1 }, c4)
  sylib(w0, ({ c1 } ⋃ c4)= c4, { c1 } ⊆ c4)
  snssd(c1, c4, w0)
  ssequn1({ c1 }, c4)
  eqid((0 ` c3))
}

blocks.name: dpjdisj
blocks.content: The two subgroups that appear in ~ dpjval are disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c2))
} = {
  eqtr3d(cin(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4), cin(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), w0)
  ineq1d(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1)))), cfv(c0, c1), w0)
  dpjlem(c2, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  simp3d(w0, wceq(cin(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4)), wa(wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), wss(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1)))))))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wa(wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, csn(c1))), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), wss(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), cfv(cfv(ccntz, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1)))))), wceq(cin(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, csn(c1))), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c0, cdif(c3, csn(c1))))), csn(c4))), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c0))
  dmdprdsplit(c2, c0, csn(c1), cdif(c3, csn(c1)), cfv(ccntz, c2), c4, c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c0, c3, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c1), cdif(c3, csn(c1))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c1), c3)
  syl5req(c3, cun(csn(c1), cdif(c3, csn(c1))), cun(csn(c1), c3), w0)
  undif2(csn(c1), c3)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c1), c3), c3), wss(csn(c1), c3))
  snssd(c1, c3, w0)
  ssequn1(csn(c1), c3)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dpjdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1)⋂(c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 }))))= { c4 })
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[dom(DProd)]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c0)= c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(0 ` c2)
} = {
  eqtr3d(((c0 ` c1)⋂(c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 })))), { c4 }, ((c2[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⋂(c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 })))), w0)
  ineq1d((c2[DProd](c0 |` { c1 })), (c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 }))), (c0 ` c1), w0)
  dpjlem(c2, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  simp3d(w0, ((c2[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⋂(c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 }))))= { c4 }, (c2[dom(DProd)](c0 |` { c1 })∧ c2[dom(DProd)](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 }))), (c2[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⊆((Cntz ` c2)`(c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 })))))
  mpbid(w0, ((c2[dom(DProd)](c0 |` { c1 })∧ c2[dom(DProd)](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 })))∧(c2[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⊆((Cntz ` c2)`(c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 }))))∧((c2[DProd](c0 |` { c1 }))⋂(c2[DProd](c0 |`(c3 \ { c1 }))))= { c4 }), c2[dom(DProd)]c0)
  dmdprdsplit(c2, c0, { c1 }, (c3 \ { c1 }), (Cntz ` c2), c4, c3, w0)
  dprdf2(c0, c3, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, ({ c1 } ⋂(c3 \ { c1 }))= ∅)
  disjdif({ c1 }, c3)
  syl5req(c3, ({ c1 } ⋃(c3 \ { c1 })), ({ c1 } ⋃ c3), w0)
  undif2({ c1 }, c3)
  sylib(w0, ({ c1 } ⋃ c3)= c3, { c1 } ⊆ c3)
  snssd(c1, c3, w0)
  ssequn1({ c1 }, c3)
  eqid((Cntz ` c2))
}

blocks.name: dpjlsm
blocks.content: The two subgroups that appear in ~ dpjval add to the full direct product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjlsm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(cfv(c1, c2), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, cdif(c4, csn(c2)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdm(cdprd), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clsm, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cdprd, c1), co(cfv(c1, c2), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, cdif(c4, csn(c2))))), co(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2))), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, cdif(c4, csn(c2))))), w0)
  dprdsplit(c0, c1, csn(c2), c3, cdif(c4, csn(c2)), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c4, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c2), cdif(c4, csn(c2))), emptycls))
  disjdif(csn(c2), c4)
  syl5req(c4, cun(csn(c2), cdif(c4, csn(c2))), cun(csn(c2), c4), w0)
  undif2(csn(c2), c4)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(csn(c2), c4), c4), wss(csn(c2), c4))
  snssd(c2, c4, w0)
  ssequn1(csn(c2), c4)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, csn(c2))), c3, co(c0, cdprd, cres(c1, cdif(c4, csn(c2)))), cfv(c1, c2), w0)
  dpjlem(c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dpjlsm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[DProd]c1)=((c1 ` c2)[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |`(c4 \ { c2 })))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[dom(DProd)]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c1)= c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(LSSum ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[DProd]c1), ((c1 ` c2)[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |`(c4 \ { c2 })))), ((c0[DProd](c1 |` { c2 }))[c3](c0[DProd](c1 |`(c4 \ { c2 })))), w0)
  dprdsplit(c0, c1, { c2 }, c3, (c4 \ { c2 }), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c1, c4, c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, ({ c2 } ⋂(c4 \ { c2 }))= ∅)
  disjdif({ c2 }, c4)
  syl5req(c4, ({ c2 } ⋃(c4 \ { c2 })), ({ c2 } ⋃ c4), w0)
  undif2({ c2 }, c4)
  sylib(w0, ({ c2 } ⋃ c4)= c4, { c2 } ⊆ c4)
  snssd(c2, c4, w0)
  ssequn1({ c2 }, c4)
  oveq1d((c0[DProd](c1 |` { c2 })), c3, (c0[DProd](c1 |`(c4 \ { c2 }))), (c1 ` c2), w0)
  dpjlem(c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
}

blocks.name: dpjfval
