blocks.origin:
thm dpjfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c1))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c4, cdpj, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpj1, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))), co(c4, cdpj, c2), w0)
  ovmpt2dx(hs0, hs1, c4, cdpj, c2, cmpt(s0, c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))), cgrp, cima(cdm(cdprd), csn(cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cfv(cpj1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cdprd, cres(cv(hs1), cdif(cdm(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(s0))))))), cima(cdm(cdprd), csn(c4)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cdpj, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cgrp, cima(cdm(cdprd), csn(cv(hs0))), cmpt(s0, cdm(cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cfv(cpj1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cdprd, cres(cv(hs1), cdif(cdm(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(s0))))))))))
  df-dpj(hs0, hs1, s0)
  mpteq12dv(s0, cdm(cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cfv(cpj1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cdprd, cres(cv(hs1), cdif(cdm(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(s0)))))), c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  oveq123d(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), cfv(cpj1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cdprd, cres(cv(hs1), cdif(cdm(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(s0))))), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cpj1, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cpj1, c4), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  fveq2d(cpj1, cv(hs0), c4, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  fveq1d(cv(hs1), cv(s0), c2, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  oveq12d(cv(hs0), cdprd, cres(cv(hs1), cdif(cdm(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(s0)))), c4, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  reseq12d(cv(hs1), cdif(cdm(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(s0))), c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  difeq1d(cdm(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(s0)), c1, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  eqtrd(cdm(cv(hs1)), c1, cdm(c2), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  dmeqd(cv(hs1), c2, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))))
  simprr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  adantr(w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(cdm(c2), c1))
  imaeq2d(cdm(cdprd), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c4), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  sneqd(cv(hs0), c4, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cgrp), wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c2))
  dprdgrp(c4, c2)
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c2, cima(cdm(cdprd), csn(c4))), wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c2))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c2, cima(cdm(cdprd), csn(c4))), wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c2)), wrel(cdm(cdprd)))
  reldmdprd()
  elrelimasn(cdm(cdprd), c2, c4)
  mptexd(s0, c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0)))))), universe, w0)
  dprddomcld(c1, c4, c2, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, c1, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c1, csn(cv(s0))))))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm dpjfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c2 ` s0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 }))))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4[dom(DProd)]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c2)= c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(c4[dProj]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(proj1 ` c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5eq(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c2 ` s0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 }))))), (c4[dProj]c2), w0)
  ovmpt2dx(hs0, hs1, c4, cdpj, c2, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c2 ` s0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 }))))), cgrp, (dom(DProd)" { hs0 }), (s0 ∈ dom(hs1)↦((hs1 ` s0)[(proj1 ` hs0)](hs0[DProd](hs1 |`(dom(hs1)\ { s0 }))))), (dom(DProd)" { c4 }), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, dProj =(hs0 ∈ Grp, hs1 ∈(dom(DProd)" { hs0 })↦(s0 ∈ dom(hs1)↦((hs1 ` s0)[(proj1 ` hs0)](hs0[DProd](hs1 |`(dom(hs1)\ { s0 })))))))
  df-dpj(hs0, hs1, s0)
  mpteq12dv(s0, dom(hs1), ((hs1 ` s0)[(proj1 ` hs0)](hs0[DProd](hs1 |`(dom(hs1)\ { s0 })))), c1, ((c2 ` s0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 })))), (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  oveq123d((hs1 ` s0), (proj1 ` hs0), (hs0[DProd](hs1 |`(dom(hs1)\ { s0 }))), (c2 ` s0), c3, (c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 }))), (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  syl6eqr((proj1 ` hs0), c3, (proj1 ` c4), (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  fveq2d(cpj1, hs0, c4, (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  fveq1d(hs1, s0, c2, (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  oveq12d(hs0, cdprd, (hs1 |`(dom(hs1)\ { s0 })), c4, (c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 })), (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 = c4, hs1 = c2)
  reseq12d(hs1, (dom(hs1)\ { s0 }), c2, (c1 \ { s0 }), (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  difeq1d(dom(hs1), { s0 }, c1, (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  eqtrd(dom(hs1), c1, dom(c2), (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  dmeqd(hs1, c2, (w0 ∧(hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2)))
  simprr(w0, hs0 = c4, hs1 = c2)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2), dom(c2)= c1)
  imaeq2d(dom(DProd), { hs0 }, { c4 }, (w0 ∧ hs0 = c4))
  sneqd(hs0, c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 = c4))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = c4)
  syl(w0, c4 ∈ Grp, c4[dom(DProd)]c2)
  dprdgrp(c4, c2)
  sylibr(w0, c2 ∈(dom(DProd)" { c4 }), c4[dom(DProd)]c2)
  ax-mp((c2 ∈(dom(DProd)" { c4 })↔ c4[dom(DProd)]c2), Rel(dom(DProd)))
  reldmdprd()
  elrelimasn(dom(DProd), c2, c4)
  mptexd(s0, c1, ((c2 ` s0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 })))), universe, w0)
  dprddomcld(c1, c4, c2, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c2 ` s0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 }))))))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c2 ` s0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c1 \ { s0 }))))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (hs0 = c4 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c4, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dpjval
blocks.content: Value of the direct product projection (defined in terms of binary projection). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), co(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), c5))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c4, cdpj, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cpj1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1))))), c5, co(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0)))))), universe, w0)
  dpjfval(hs0, c0, c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  oveq12d(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0))))), cfv(c2, c1), co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1)))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  fveq2d(c2, cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  oveq2d(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0)))), cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  reseq2d(c2, cdif(c5, csn(cv(hs0))), cdif(c5, csn(c1)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  difeq2d(c5, csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c1), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sneqd(cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  ovexd(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1)))), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cfv(c2, c1), c3, co(c4, cdprd, cres(c2, cdif(c5, csn(c1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

thm dpjval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)=((c2 ` c1)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 })))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4[dom(DProd)]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c2)= c5)
  ⊣ c0 =(c4[dProj]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(proj1 ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, ((c2 ` c1)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 })))), c5, ((c2 ` hs0)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { hs0 })))), universe, w0)
  dpjfval(hs0, c0, c5, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  oveq12d((c2 ` hs0), c3, (c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { hs0 }))), (c2 ` c1), (c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 }))), (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  fveq2d(c2, hs0, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  oveq2d(c4, cdprd, (c2 |`(c5 \ { hs0 })), (c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 })), (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  reseq2d(c2, (c5 \ { hs0 }), (c5 \ { c1 }), (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  difeq2d(c5, { hs0 }, { c1 }, (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  sneqd(hs0, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, hs0 = c1)
  ovexd((c2 ` c1), c3, (c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 }))), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(((c2 ` c1)[c3](c4[DProd](c2 |`(c5 \ { c1 })))))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: dpjf
blocks.content: The ` X ` -th index projection is a function from the direct product to the ` X ` -th factor. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dpjf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c3), cfv(c3, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cdpj, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wf(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c3), cfv(c3, c1)), wf(co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpj1, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), cfv(c3, c1)))
  pj1f(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpj1, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), cfv(clsm, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2), c2, cfv(c0g, c2), cfv(ccntz, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, cfv(csubg, c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))
  simpld(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), wss(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), co(c2, cdprd, c3)))
  dprdres(c2, c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)), c4, w0)
  difssd(c4, csn(c1), w0)
  dprdsubg(c2, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))
  dpjdisj(c3, c1, c2, c4, cfv(c0g, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  dpjcntz(c3, c1, cfv(ccntz, c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c2))
  feq12d(cfv(c0, c1), co(c2, cdprd, c3), cfv(c3, c1), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpj1, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), w0)
  dpjval(c0, c1, c3, cfv(cpj1, c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cpj1, c2))
  dpjlsm(c2, c3, c1, cfv(clsm, c2), c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dpjf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ` c1):(c2[DProd]c3)→(c3 ` c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[dom(DProd)]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c3)= c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(c2[dProj]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ((c0 ` c1):(c2[DProd]c3)→(c3 ` c1)), (((c3 ` c1)[(proj1 ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))):((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))→(c3 ` c1)))
  pj1f((c3 ` c1), (proj1 ` c2), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))), (LSSum ` c2), (+ ` c2), c2, (0 ` c2), (Cntz ` c2), w0)
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, (SubGrp ` c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))∈(SubGrp ` c2), c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  simpld(w0, c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))⊆(c2[DProd]c3))
  dprdres(c2, c3, (c4 \ { c1 }), c4, w0)
  difssd(c4, { c1 }, w0)
  dprdsubg(c2, (c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  dpjdisj(c3, c1, c2, c4, (0 ` c2), w0)
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  dpjcntz(c3, c1, (Cntz ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c2))
  feq12d((c0 ` c1), (c2[DProd]c3), (c3 ` c1), ((c3 ` c1)[(proj1 ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), ((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), w0)
  dpjval(c0, c1, c3, (proj1 ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((proj1 ` c2))
  dpjlsm(c2, c3, c1, (LSSum ` c2), c4, w0)
  eqid((LSSum ` c2))
}

thm dpjidcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), c3), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c5), c0))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c4, cdpj, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c4, cdprd, c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s1, cixp(s2, c0, cfv(c5, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), cfsupp, c6)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), c3), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), c3), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  rexlimddv(hs0, c3, w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), c3), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2))))), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cv(hs0))))
  simprd(w0, wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cv(hs0)))), wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c5))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c5), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c2, co(c4, cdprd, c5)))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c2, co(c4, cdprd, c5)), wa(wbr(c4, cdm(cdprd), c5), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cdm(c5), c0))
  eldprd(hs0, s1, s2, c5, c0, c2, c4, c3, c6)
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)), c3), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  dprdwd(s0, s1, s2, c0, cfv(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2), c3, c5, c6, c4, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, co(c4, cgsu, cv(hs0))))))

thm dpjghm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c3), c4))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, cdpj, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  3eltr4d(cfv(c0, c1), co(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, c2), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpj1, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), co(co(c2, cress, co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))), cghm, c2), w0)
  pj1ghm(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpj1, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), c2, cfv(clsm, c2), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0g, c2), cfv(ccntz, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c2))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, cfv(csubg, c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), cfv(csubg, c2)), wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))
  simpld(w0, wbr(c2, cdm(cdprd), cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), wss(co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))), co(c2, cdprd, c3)))
  dprdres(c2, c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)), c4, w0)
  difssd(c4, csn(c1), w0)
  dprdsubg(c2, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))
  dpjdisj(c3, c1, c2, c4, cfv(c0g, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  dpjcntz(c3, c1, cfv(ccntz, c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ccntz, c2))
  dpjval(c0, c1, c3, cfv(cpj1, c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cpj1, c2))
  oveq1d(co(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3)), cghm, c2, co(c2, cress, co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1)))))), w0)
  oveq2d(c2, cress, co(c2, cdprd, c3), co(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(clsm, c2), co(c2, cdprd, cres(c3, cdif(c4, csn(c1))))), w0)
  dpjlsm(c2, c3, c1, cfv(clsm, c2), c4, w0)
  eqid(cfv(clsm, c2))
}

thm dpjghm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[dom(DProd)]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → dom(c3)= c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(c2[dProj]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
} = {
  3eltr4d((c0 ` c1), ((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3))[GrpHom]c2), ((c3 ` c1)[(proj1 ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), ((c2[|`s]((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))))[GrpHom]c2), w0)
  pj1ghm((c3 ` c1), (proj1 ` c2), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))), c2, (LSSum ` c2), (+ ` c2), (0 ` c2), (Cntz ` c2), w0)
  eqid((+ ` c2))
  ffvelrnd(c3, c1, (SubGrp ` c2), c4, w0)
  dprdf2(c3, c4, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))∈(SubGrp ` c2), c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  simpld(w0, c2[dom(DProd)](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })), (c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))⊆(c2[DProd]c3))
  dprdres(c2, c3, (c4 \ { c1 }), c4, w0)
  difssd(c4, { c1 }, w0)
  dprdsubg(c2, (c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))
  dpjdisj(c3, c1, c2, c4, (0 ` c2), w0)
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  dpjcntz(c3, c1, (Cntz ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((Cntz ` c2))
  dpjval(c0, c1, c3, (proj1 ` c2), c2, c4, w0)
  eqid((proj1 ` c2))
  oveq1d((c2[|`s](c2[DProd]c3)), cghm, c2, (c2[|`s]((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 }))))), w0)
  oveq2d(c2, cress, (c2[DProd]c3), ((c3 ` c1)[(LSSum ` c2)](c2[DProd](c3 |`(c4 \ { c1 })))), w0)
  dpjlsm(c2, c3, c1, (LSSum ` c2), c4, w0)

}
